title: How to check out a resume writing service - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d ask for samples of their work — how will you know if like what they produce if you haven’t seen a sample? I would also refuse to pay for something before I saw the finished product, and was able to get it to the point where either I was satisfied with it, or their reason for doing it their way made excellent sense.

Thank you for requesting the question. You must consider the following points: The personalization of the service: Is there someone who is going to hold one to one interactions with you, ask you questions and work on your CV?The price: Do you have to pay $100 for a CV? If yes, you can do better (example)Do they have some following on social media? Check if reviews are availableAll the best!
